QuestData.Title: Fuel of a Doomed World
QuestData.Description: There is a rare and precious resource to be found in these wastes, $n.$b$bArgunite was once abundant on Argus. Its magical properties helped eredar civilization thrive. Far better for us to make use of its power than the Legion.$b$bSeek out all the pristine argunite you can, champion. Every bit you recover will aid our cause.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Pristine Argunite from Invasion Points, Rare encounters, or treasure chests on Argus.
QuestData.CompletionText: Victory requires every resource we can muster.
QuestData.RewardText: A good start, hero. There is plenty more where that came from.
